content:
"""
I notice the inserters are still not correctly aligned. Let's try one more time with precise positioning and rotations.
"""

# First clean up everything again
for entity in get_entities({Prototype.BurnerInserter, Prototype.IronChest, Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill}):
    pickup_entity(entity.name, entity.position)

# 1. Place drill on iron patch
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=10)

# 2. Place chest exactly one tile below drill's drop position
chest = place_entity(
    Prototype.IronChest, 
    Position(x=drill.drop_position.x, y=drill.drop_position.y + 1)
)

# 3. Place and configure first inserter (drill to chest)
inserter1 = place_entity(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    Position(x=drill.position.x + 1, y=drill.position.y)
)
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.DOWN)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter1, quantity=5)

# 4. Place and configure second inserter (chest to furnace)
furnace = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})[0]
inserter2 = place_entity(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    Position(x=chest.position.x + 1, y=chest.position.y)
)
rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter2, quantity=5)

# Add fuel and ore to furnaces
for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}):
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)

print("\nDetailed automation setup:")
print("Entity positions and configurations:")
for entity in get_entities():
    print(f"\n{entity.name} at {entity.position}")
    print(f"Status: {entity.status}")
    if hasattr(entity, 'drop_position'):
        print(f"Drop position: {entity.drop_position}")

print(f"\nInventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
